channel.title: Dropping items
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm running a 317 delta server and every time I drop an item, it disapears into the ground, how do I make it so when I drop the item other players will see it?

item.title: Dropping items
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:465475”]I’m guessing that this has to do with Player Rights being a condition, and not because dropping was completely taken out.

Packet 87 if I’m correct.[/quote]

i don’t think that is true…i think dropping WAS completely removed because of potential dupes on the older 317’s…ive played servers like that…sloppy coders have it completely removed…others just have it delete item instead of drop…

Read full topic

item.title: Dropping items

item.description:
@ponqueque wrote:

What does that mean? Sorry, pretty new to making rsps’s.

Read full topic
